channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16340] ensure no Xerces jars included
item.description: When we moved our pom to Hadoop 2.7 we picked up a transitive Xerces implementation. We should exclude this to ensure we don't get a conflict with the implementation that ships with the jvm.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
-01

  • exclude xerces from hadoop-hdfs artifacts

AFAIK we don't use the XMLEditsVisitor directly (nor should we), so we ought not be impacted by not including the xerces jar.

-1 overall

all OOMs. looks ominous. I recall a recent builds@ email about jdk versions getting standardized / updated. maybe we fell afoul of something. lemme try to rerun.
this also needs a banned dependencies check

-02

  • add a maven enforcer check that makes sure the xercesImpl jar doesn't come back.
+1 Thanks Sean Busbey

looks like I'll need to deconflict the addition of the maven enforcer rule with the BHASE-16321 patch. I'll presume that fixup doesn't change anyone's review unless I hear otherwise.

(stack you still +1 with the addition of the enforcer rule?)

Checking to see if it happens on master without this patch, since I'm not sure why removing xercesImpl would make commons-httpclient stop showing up in the classpath.
happens on master, unrelated to this patch. looks like stack is already on top of it in HBASE-16361.
Yes sir
arg. already pushed. I'll add your signoff to the back port branches. sorry!

reopening due to issue found by @larsh on HBASE-16318. We should include this on the other active branches to make sure we don't get xerces when building against hadoop 2.7.
Are you doing this Sean Busbey ? I'm on deck for release work today and can take care of this as part of working on 0.98
I had scheduled it for myself, but I've gotten caught up in a (non-hbase) perf issue. it'd be great if you could take care of it.
Pushed to 0.98, branch-1.1, and branch-1.2. I verified each change with a build using Hadoop 2.7.2.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: HBase no longer includes Xerces implementation jars that were previously included via transitive dependencies. Downstream users relying on HBase for these artifacts will need to update their dependencies.
